Which <S%G3739><s%> was well reported <S%G3140><s%> of by <S%G5259><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%> that were at <S%G1722><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%>.

Him <S%G5126><s%> would <S%G2309><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> have to go forth <S%G1831><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> and circumcised <S%G4059><s%> him <S%G846><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> quarters <S%G5117><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they knew <S%G1492><s%> all <S%G537><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> his <S%G846><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> was <S%G5225><s%> a Greek <S%G1672><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> they went through <S%G1279><s%> the cities <S%G4172><s%>, they delivered <S%G3860><s%> them <S%G846><s%> the decrees <S%G1378><s%> for to keep <S%G5442><s%>, that were ordained <S%G2919><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> were at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>.

And so <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> were <S%G4732><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> established <S%G4732><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> increased <S%G4052><s%> in number <S%G706><s%> daily <S%G2250><s%> <S%G2596><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when they had gone throughout <S%G1330><s%> Phrygia <S%G5435><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the region <S%G5561><s%> of Galatia <S%G1054><s%>, and were forbidden <S%G2967><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> to preach <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>,

After they were come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G2596><s%> Mysia <S%G3465><s%>, they assayed <S%G3985><s%> to go <S%G4198><s%> into <S%G2596><s%> Bithynia <S%G978><s%>: but <S%G2532><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> suffered <S%G1439><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> they passing by <S%G3928><s%> Mysia <S%G3465><s%> came down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> a vision <S%G3705><s%> appeared <S%G3700><s%> to Paul <S%G3972><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> the night <S%G3571><s%>; There stood <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2476><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> <S%G435><s%> of Macedonia <S%G3110><s%>, and prayed <S%G3870><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Come over <S%G1224><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, and help <S%G997><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G5613><s%> he had seen <S%G1492><s%> the vision <S%G3705><s%>, immediately <S%G2112><s%> we endeavoured <S%G2212><s%> to go <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, assuredly gathering <S%G4822><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had called <S%G4341><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> for to preach the gospel <S%G2097><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> loosing <S%G321><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%>, we came with a straight course <S%G2113><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Samothracia <S%G4543><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> the next <S%G1966><s%> day to <S%G1519><s%> Neapolis <S%G3496><s%>;

And <S%G5037><s%> from thence <S%G1564><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Philippi <S%G5375><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the chief <S%G4413><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> of that part <S%G3310><s%> of Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>, and a colony <S%G2862><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> we were <S%G2258><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G5026><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> abiding <S%G1304><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>. the chief: or, the first

And <S%G5037><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> <S%G2250><s%> we went <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1854><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> a river side <S%G4215><s%>, where <S%G3757><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%> was wont <S%G3543><s%> to be made <S%G1511><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> we sat down <S%G2523><s%>, and spake <S%G2980><s%> unto the women <S%G1135><s%> which resorted <S%G4905><s%> thither. sabbath: Gr. sabbath day

And <S%G2532><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Lydia <S%G3070><s%>, a seller of purple <S%G4211><s%>, of the city <S%G4172><s%> of Thyatira <S%G2363><s%>, which worshipped <S%G4576><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, heard <S%G191><s%> us: whose <S%G3739><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> opened <S%G1272><s%>, that she attended <S%G4337><s%> unto the things which were spoken <S%G2980><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> she was baptized <S%G907><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> household <S%G3624><s%>, she besought <S%G3870><s%> us, saying <S%G3004><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> ye have judged <S%G2919><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, come <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> house <S%G3624><s%>, and abide <S%G3306><s%> there. And <S%G2532><s%> she constrained <S%G3849><s%> us <S%G2248><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, as we <S%G2257><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%>, a certain <S%G5100><s%> damsel <S%G3814><s%> possessed <S%G2192><s%> with a spirit <S%G4151><s%> of divination <S%G4436><s%> met <S%G528><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> brought <S%G3930><s%> her <S%G846><s%> masters <S%G2962><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> gain <S%G2039><s%> by soothsaying <S%G3132><s%>: of divination: or, of Python

The same <S%G3778><s%> followed <S%G2628><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> us <S%G2254><s%>, and cried <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, These <S%G3778><s%> men <S%G444><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of the most high <S%G5310><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> shew <S%G2605><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of salvation <S%G4991><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> did she <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1909><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> days <S%G2250><s%>. But <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, being grieved <S%G1278><s%>, turned <S%G1994><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, I command <S%G3853><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> to come <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> her <S%G846><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> teach <S%G2605><s%> customs <S%G1485><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for us <S%G2254><s%> to receive <S%G3858><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> to observe <S%G4160><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> Romans <S%G4514><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> rose up together <S%G4911><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> them <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the magistrates <S%G4755><s%> rent off <S%G4048><s%> their <S%G846><s%> clothes <S%G2440><s%>, and commanded <S%G2753><s%> to beat <S%G4463><s%> them.

And <S%G5037><s%> when they had laid <S%G2007><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> stripes <S%G4127><s%> upon them <S%G846><s%>, they cast <S%G906><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>, charging <S%G3853><s%> the jailor <S%G1200><s%> to keep <S%G5083><s%> them <S%G846><s%> safely <S%G806><s%>:

Who <S%G3739><s%>, having received <S%G2983><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a charge <S%G3852><s%>, thrust <S%G906><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the inner <S%G2082><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G805><s%> their <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> fast <S%G805><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the stocks <S%G3586><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> at <S%G2596><s%> midnight <S%G3317><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%> prayed <S%G4336><s%>, and sang praises <S%G5214><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> the prisoners <S%G1198><s%> heard <S%G1874><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> suddenly <S%G869><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> earthquake <S%G4578><s%>, so that <S%G5620><s%> the foundations <S%G2310><s%> of the prison <S%G1201><s%> were shaken <S%G4531><s%>: and <S%G5037><s%> immediately <S%G3916><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the doors <S%G2374><s%> were opened <S%G455><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> every one's <S%G3956><s%> bands <S%G1199><s%> were loosed <S%G447><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the keeper of the prison <S%G1200><s%> awaking <S%G1096><s%> out of his sleep <S%G1853><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> the prison <S%G5438><s%> doors <S%G2374><s%> open <S%G455><s%>, he drew out <S%G4685><s%> his sword <S%G3162><s%>, and would <S%G3195><s%> have killed <S%G337><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%>, supposing <S%G3543><s%> that the prisoners <S%G1198><s%> had been fled <S%G1628><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> he called <S%G154><s%> for a light <S%G5457><s%>, and sprang in <S%G1530><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> trembling <S%G1790><s%>, and fell down before <S%G4363><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Silas <S%G4609><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> they spake <S%G2980><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> that were in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> when he had brought <S%G321><s%> them <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his house <S%G3624><s%>, he set <S%G3908><s%> meat <S%G5132><s%> before them <S%G3908><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> rejoiced <S%G21><s%>, believing <S%G4100><s%> in God <S%G2316><s%> with all <S%G3832><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3832><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when it was <S%G1096><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, the magistrates <S%G4755><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> the serjeants <S%G4465><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Let <S%G630><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> men <S%G444><s%> go <S%G630><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they went <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the prison <S%G5438><s%>, and entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house of Lydia <S%G3070><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when they had seen <S%G1492><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>, they comforted <S%G3870><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> departed <S%G1831><s%>.
